5837.quoteText: Third-Party Service Providers: We employ other companies and individuals to perform functions on our behalf. Examples include: delivering AWS hardware, sending communications, processing payments, assessing credit and compliance risks, analyzing data, providing marketing and sales assistance (including advertising and event management), conducting customer relationship management, and providing training. These third party service providers have access to personal information needed to perform their functions, but may not use it for other purposes. Further, they must process that information in accordance with this Privacy Notice and as permitted by applicable data protection law.
5837.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

10885.quoteText:
As we continue to develop our business, we might sell or buy businesses or services.
In such transactions, personal information generally is one of the transferred business assets
10885.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

tosdr.case: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

10886.quoteText: We use your personal information to recommend AWS Offerings that might be of interest to you, identify your preferences, and personalize your experience with AWS Offerings
10886.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

10887.quoteText:
Location of Personal Information

Amazon Web Services, Inc. is located in the United States, and our affiliated companies are located throughout the world
10887.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

tosdr.case: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

11377.quoteText:
Subject to applicable law, you have the right to:

  • ask whether we hold personal information about you and request copies of such personal information and information about how it is processed;
  • request that inaccurate personal information is corrected;
  • request deletion of personal information that is no longer necessary for the purposes underlying the processing
11377.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data

tosdr.case: You can request access and deletion of personal data

11378.quoteText:
We use your personal information to market and promote AWS Offerings.
We might display interest-based ads for AWS Offerings.
To learn more, please read our Interest-Based Ads notice.
11378.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
